programme.title: The special relationship
programme.short_synopsis: Harold Wilson's resignation, and the special relationship between the US and UK.
programme.medium_synopsis: Reassessing the 'special relationship' between the UK and US, in the light of British Prime Minister Harold Wilson's sudden resignation.
